data.comment: The match is underway at Sardegna Arena.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Spezia at Sardegna Arena.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
In the minute 4, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Valerio Marini signals a Spezia throw-in in Cagliari's half.
In the minute 5, Spezia are caught offside.
Spezia surge into the attack at Sardegna Arena but Diego Fariasâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Valerio Marini awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Cagliari.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
Cagliari needs to be cautious. Spezia have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 15, Valerio Marini awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
Spezia are pushing forward but Diego Farias's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 16, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cagliari.
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
In the minute 18, Cagliari to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Throw-in Spezia.
Valerio Marini signals a Spezia throw-in in Cagliari's half.
Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Spezia drives forward and Diego Farias gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Spezia's Giulio Maggiore breaks free at Sardegna Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
In the minute 24, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Cagliari.
Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Spezia.
Free kick Spezia.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Salva Ferrer (Spezia) has received a yellow card from Valerio Marini.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
In the minute 31, Valerio Marini signals a throw-in for Cagliari, close to Spezia's area.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Cagliari's Riccardo Sottil gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Spezia defender.
In the minute 33, Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Claudio Terzi is booked for the away team.
In Cagliari Spezia attack through Simone Bastoni. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Goal! Emmanuel Gyasi gives Spezia a 0-1 lead in Cagliari.
That's a fine assist from Simone Bastoni.
In the minute 37, Cagliari's Adam Ounas misses with an attempt on goal.
Valerio Marini awards Spezia a goal kick.
Free kick for Spezia in the half of Cagliari.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valerio Marini awards the away team a throw-in.
Spezia are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 43, Throw-in high up the field for Cagliari in Cagliari.
Can Cagliari capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Spezia's Nahuel Estevez has been booked in Cagliari.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
Spezia drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
At Sardegna Arena the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, In Cagliari a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Cagliari's Sebastian Walukiewicz goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Sardegna Arena.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Cagliari.
In the minute 46, Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Spezia make their first substitution with Jacopo Sala replacing Salva Ferrer.
Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Spezia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cagliari's half?
In the minute 48, Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Spezia.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 50, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Valerio Marini signals a Cagliari throw-in in Spezia's half.
In the minute 51, Can Cagliari get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
Cagliari have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! Joao Pedro equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 52, Great play from Gabriele Zappa to set up the goal.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Cagliari.
Spezia pushes forward through Giulio Maggiore, whose finish on goal is saved.
Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cagliari.
Nahuel Estevez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spezia.
Goal! Leonardo Pavoletti gives Cagliari a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 58, Gabriele Zappa with an assist there.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
Free kick Cagliari.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Spezia.
Cagliari have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
In the minute 62, Important block from the Spezia defence as Riccardo Sottil fires in a strike for Cagliari.
Throw-in high up the field for Spezia in Cagliari.
Spezia are whistled for offside.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Spezia.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Julian Chabot is on a sub for Claudio Terzi for Spezia.
In the minute 63, Vincenzo Italiano is making the team's third substitution at Sardegna Arena with Alessandro Deiola replacing Nahuel Estevez.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the away team in Cagliari.
Spezia have a goal kick.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Cagliari to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
Throw-in for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Spezia.
Adam Ounas of Cagliari gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Spezia at Sardegna Arena.
In the minute 71, Spezia have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
Julian Chabot's header is off-target for Spezia.
Valerio Marini awards Cagliari a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Spezia in the half of Cagliari.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
Eusebio Di Francesco (Cagliari) is making a first substitution, with Alessandro Tripaldelli replacing Andrea Carboni.
In the minute 74, Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
In Cagliari a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Valerio Marini.
In the minute 75, Julian Chabot (Spezia) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cagliari.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 76, In Cagliari, Spezia push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The home team replace Leonardo Pavoletti with Alberto Cerri.
The home team have replaced Adam Ounas with Paolo Farago. This is the third substitution made today by Eusebio Di Francesco.
In the minute 78, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Cagliari's Riccardo Sottil is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 78, Cagliari's Marko Rog gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Valerio Marini awards Spezia a goal kick.
Valerio Marini awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, Kevin Agudelo is replacing Emmanuel Gyasi for Spezia at Sardegna Arena.
Free kick Cagliari.
In the minute 81, Julian Chabot (Spezia) gets a yellow card.
Cagliari are coming forward and Joao Pedro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Spezia have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Valerio Marini signals a Cagliari throw-in in Spezia's half.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Roberto Piccoli is replacing Matteo Ricci for the away team.
In the minute 85, Cagliari to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Cagliari's Alberto Cerri attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
In the minute 86, Spezia are pushing forward but Giulio Maggiore's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cagliari.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Cagliari.
In the minute 87, Throw-in Spezia.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Spezia's Roberto Piccoli gets in a shot on goal at Sardegna Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Valerio Marini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 89, The home team have replaced Riccardo Sottil with Fabrizio Caligara. This is the fourth substitution made today by Eusebio Di Francesco.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Cagliari.
Joao Pedro for Cagliari is whistled offside.
Valerio Marini awards Cagliari a goal kick.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Spezia.
Full-time! The final score is 2-2.
M'bala Nzola scores from the spot and Spezia draw level at Sardegna Arena.
